title: Understanding Two-Factor Authentication
text: Two-factor authentication (2FA) requires two forms of identification before granting access. This could be something you know (like a password) and something you have (like a phone).

title: Why Use Two-Factor Authentication?
text: 2FA adds an extra layer of security by making it harder for unauthorized users to access your account, even if they have your password.

title: Evaluating the Statement
text: Does requiring two forms of identification enhance security?
